channel.title: Cant get friends on my moparscape, hamachi server
channel.description: First I downloaded moparscape and the servers correctly. I got the jdk and compiled and ran the server. Then i downloaded hamachi, put my group on there and let people join it. How come none of the friends who join my hamachi group cant play on my moparscape server.

item.title: Cant get friends on my moparscape, hamachi server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

battle,maybe firewall messed up server or wrong ip like mjstar said

Read full topic

item.title: Cant get friends on my moparscape, hamachi server
item.dc:creator: @mjstar mjstar
item.description:
@mjstar wrote:

This happened to me today but the only problem is there not typing in the right address ok first off tell them to type in the ip that it says at the top of your hamachi(e.g. 5.11.90.0) and get them to try that if that doesnt work try again but get them to add the port your using if that still doesnt work check that hamachi isnt blocked by windows firewall go into control panel and then windows firewall and make an exception to the program if that still doesnt work i have no idea

Read full topic
item.source: Cant get friends on my moparscape, hamachi server
